review: Worked like a charm, easy to install and use.
author: Ronny R. Shipley

review: I'm ready to ditch the dish! So, I wanted to give the Fire TV a try.  The Fire Stick was easy to setup, and has a clear picture!  I didn't have a problem with buffering, although your ISP plan has a lot to do with that. I plan on ordering Amazon Prime for more movie choices. Although, I wish Amazon offered live tv with the Prime, that would be awesome!  Though, I have no complaints because I can select what I want to watch. I don't have to worry about paying for programs I don't like or multiple channels of the same thing!  Amazon continues to deliver!!!
author: Debra L. Gomez

review: I've got a couple different versions of Roku that I love, however, and I can't believe I'm about to say this, but I think I like the Firestick better!!  You can download games.  Interface is smooth and easy on the eyes.  Nicely engineered.  I love it and might buy another to replace one of the original and now aging Rokus.
author: La Piniac

review: It didn't work on my bigger HDTV, but it works on my little one.

review: This is a really good product that makes it easy to stream shows and movies to your TV.  It even has some games that you can download to play on your TV.  I would recommend the product to others.
